attributes.action: create an independent "political donations conduit", to prevent individual donors being linked with individual donation sums. If donors ask for favours the party can never be sure if they actually received any money from that individual.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Donations are placed in the "donations pipeline" addressed to the political party of your choice.
To prevent "morse code" signals of peculiar sums being given at specific dates (indicating the donor's identity) only "round sums" can be given, and the money is passed to the party only every 3 months - or weekly before an election - with no details available as to the value of individual sums or the dates they were given.

It would be an offence to attempt to prove the amount or date you donated.

Would you automatically be registered as a political donor? I think yes, but ... 

Would the party to which you donated be disclosed? I think no, but ... 

Would it be disclosed how many party's you donated to. I think yes, but ...

Implement this on the big party's. With other party's allowed to receive donations directly until some threshold is reached.
